description: On his first appearance on Maskurbate, Brad told us he was a personal trainer during the day, and a stripper at night. Since then, I hired him to put me back in shape. It's very motivating to have him wait for me at the gym. Though he is a very good trainer, I wanted to have a glimpse of his night job! So, I booked him for my very own private dance, Maskurbate style! Now that we've become closer friends, I can't wait to see what Brad's upcoming scenes will be. Until then, I'll continue to pump iron and get my rewards...
title: Stripper Service 2, Scene #01
